sub_title: Management Consulting Manager | Connected & Sustainable Cities & Buildings | BIM & Digital Twins | Business Development | MBA | Architect
summary:
MBA, architect, entrepreneur, and business developer with a demonstrated history of working in both the corporate and startup world. A creative and strategic thinker. Passionate about technology, and sustainability and integrate creativity and business to make ideas into realities. 

Proactive individual with 9 years of experience in architecture and engaging business development adept at often developing complex client proposals and creative problem-solving.

Skilled designer from concept to execution. Proficient in various business operations, including business development, developing and nurturing productive client relationships, project management, creating and leading marketing campaigns, and consultancy

school.name: WHU – Otto Beisheim School of Management - Financial Times #1 ranking program in Germany

awards.title: Woman in Business Scholarship

awards.title: Kruidenbuurt Design Competition
awards.description:
The Kruidenbuurt is an attractive neighborhood to live in. With lots of greenery and variety, spacious and with as few cars on the street as possible. A lively neighborhood where children can play safely and with plenty of opportunities for meeting and interaction.
Two designs from MaSa Architecture has been selected by Trudo (developer), Stam en de Koning (Real estate and Construction) and Diederendirrix Architect in a closed competition. 
The project is currently under construction.

projects.title: Plug-in City 2.0
projects.description:
Coordinator and co-designer for the development of the creative living lab, workshop, event space, and cultural center.
The project has been accomplished by a bottom-up approach. All materials and construction equipment are the re-use of industrial elements and it has been built by the residents of Plug-in City itself.

projects.title: Renovation of New Thialf
projects.description:
Winning Design Competition-  German Design Award 2018 
Co-Architect at ZJA, primary design to execution
Thialf consists of the Thialf-hal (a 12,500-capacity speed skating venue) and the Elfstedenhal (a 2,500-capacity ice hockey venue). 
Several world records have been set in the indoor stadium. Annually, Thialf hosts two Speed Skating World Cup events. The arena has a capacity of 12,500.

profile_positions.title: Management Consulting Manager @Industry X - Connected & Sustainable Cities & Buildings

profile_positions.description:
Sustainable and circular designs and developments in the realm of architecture, construction, and infrastructure. Developing business together with architects and developers to bring innovative solutions to the market. 

Business development of Ecolve (Greentech startup), Kruidenbuurt 86 residential houses (Social impact ), and Plug-in City 2.0 (circular and bottom-up development)
profile_positions.title: Founder & Director - Focusing on Circular and Sustainable Products and Development
Senior Business Developer & Project Manager for the AEC industry

company.name: WHU – Otto Beisheim School of Management

profile_positions.company: WHU – Otto Beisheim School of Management
profile_positions.title: MBA - Strategy and Execution Specialty

profile_positions.description:
- Performed as a team lead or team member for numerous international design competitions in the Netherlands and China.  
- Provided strategy consultation for Eneco Energy company to develop and design a long-term master plan to transform the current property to a new brand as a high-tech sustainable campus for 60.000 clients of Eneco. 
- Architect and spatial strategist for various campus development projects in China and including close collaboration with clients on-site base on iCAM-Model, an inhouse campus design assessment model.
- Team lead and architect for an innovation and conference center in Nanchang with unique and expressive parametric architectural design.
- Researched through new innovative solutions and techniques in the built environment such as 3D printing, parametric design, VR, and AR within Inbo and MaSa.
profile_positions.title: Architect

profile_positions.description: - Junior Architect for Eindhoven Airport extension.
profile_positions.title: Architect & BIM Specialist

profile_positions.description:
- BIM specialist and coordinator involved with the award-winning renovation of the international Ice-Skating Stadium Thialf in Heerenveen, Worked in close contact with stakeholders to deliver an iconic brand and building through parametric design.
- Conducted research to create solutions to use excess heat from a nearby Wavin factory for swimming pool projects to optimize cost and energy use.  
- Infrastructure strategy consultant and BIM specialist for Oosterweel highway connection in Antwerp to drastically improve high-density traffic area and crossing flows and the integration into the city.
profile_positions.title: Architect - BIM Specialist

profile_positions.description:
- A team contributor on specialized school projects for design and management in the Netherlands.  
- Spatial planning and strategy to revitalize unused factories to accommodate new functions in the urban context.
- Value engineering strategies and space utilization to design facilities in public buildings and create flexible office spaces for freelancers and entrepreneurs.
profile_positions.title: Architectural Assistant

profile_positions.description: - Team contributor in various projects such as Eindhoven Airport Entrance Area,  HetHuis intuitive, and small scale products development.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Traineeship

volunteer_experiences.description: 5 days Future Fundraising Challenge rasing over 15,000 euro for Welthungerhilfe to be donated to the refugee camps during COVID-19 crisis.

- Created and maintained a centeral inbo graphical libraries (INBODESIGNLIB) for 200-250 employees. 
- Created protocol manuals for various programs for new employees.
Instructor of Revit for Junior/Medior and assistance Architect within the firm
Offered courses for Rendering, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, SketchUp, Post-Visualization techniques for Junior/Medior and assistance Architect and Urban Designers
